title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same operations as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: chatbot-ollama
summary: Next.js chatbot template that talks to Ollama; includes memory, file upload, and RAG.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL for Ollama with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri (Rust+React).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints and UI to manage and chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client.
